Text: {d}lamma tar-sir₂-sir₂-ra\gen ama {d}ba-u₂ nin-a-ni\dat nam-til₃ {d}šul-gi nita kalag-ga lugal urim₅{ki}-ma lugal ki-en-gi ki-uri-ka-še₃ ha-la-{d}lamma dumu lu₂-giri₁₇-zal ensi₂ lagaš{ki}-ka-ke₄
